pr_title: Add checkstyle rule to show final local variable violations as warning

timeline.bodyText: Remove this line, it's pointless, as we require all parameters to be final with that other rule anyway.
timeline.author: wb9688
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -154,6 +154,11 @@
         <module name="MultipleVariableDeclarations"/>
         <module name="SimplifyBooleanExpression"/>
         <module name="SimplifyBooleanReturn"/>
+        <module name="FinalLocalVariable">
+            <property name="tokens" value="VARIABLE_DEF,PARAMETER_DEF"/>

replies.bodyText: Hmm… it seems to make a significant difference in amount of warnings
replies.author: wb9688

timeline.message: Add checkstyle rule to show final local variable violations as warning
